data.title: Guglielmo Marconi Biography, Birthday. Awards & Facts About Guglielmo Marconi
data.meta_description: Guglielmo Marconi detail biography, family, facts and date of birth. Awards of Guglielmo Marconi, birthday, children and many other facts. See Guglielmo Marconi's spouse, children, sibling and parent names.
